entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
